title: A culprit behind rising prices? Remote work.
itunes:title: A culprit behind rising prices? Remote work.
itunes:author: Marketplace / Kai Ryssdal
description: Plenty of folks who began working from home during the pandemic are still there. Today, we’ll take a look at how much that WFH reality may be pushing up housing costs and what it means for the Federal Reserve’s inflation fight. Plus, how portfolio dips affect your spending, how women’s colleges are responding to financial pressures and what Gallup’s CEO thinks about happiness and work.
